items.name: Amethyst orb
items.description: A round, purple-hued mushroom with a crystalline sheen on its cap
items.taste: Earthy with a hint of grape

consumption_effect.description: A nourishing mushroom with no special effects

items.name: Brainconk
items.description: A wrinkled, brain-shaped bracket fungus that grows on dead oaks

consumption_effect.description: Grants vivid dreams if eaten before sleep

items.name: Chanctonslip
items.description: Slender, pale mushrooms with a slippery texture
items.smell: Fresh and clean, like morning dew

consumption_effect.description: A pleasant, easily digestible mushroom

items.name: Deathcap mimic
items.description: Resembles the deadly deathcap but with subtle orange flecks on the cap

consumption_effect.description: Grants +1 to saves vs fear for eating something that looks deadly

items.name: Devil's fingers
items.description: Red, tentacle-like protrusions emerging from a white egg sac
items.smell: Strong carrion stench that fades when cooked
items.taste: Meaty and peppery when prepared properly

consumption_effect.description: Provides warmth, granting resistance to natural cold

items.name: Elf-cup
items.description: Bright scarlet, cup-shaped fungi found on rotting branches

consumption_effect.description: A favorite of the fey, considered good luck to find

items.name: Green-finger morel
items.description: Honeycomb-textured cap with a distinctive greenish tinge
items.taste: Rich, earthy, and prized by gourmands

consumption_effect.description: Highly prized by cooks; can be sold to taverns

items.name: Hell horns
items.description: Black, horn-shaped mushrooms with ridged surfaces
items.taste: Intensely savory with an almost meaty quality

consumption_effect.description: Exceptionally filling; counts as 2 rations worth of food

items.name: Hogback truffle
items.description: Lumpy, dark brown truffle found just beneath the soil
items.smell: Pungent and earthy, irresistible to pigs
items.taste: Complex, with notes of garlic and hazelnut

consumption_effect.description: A delicacy; can be sold to wealthy buyers

items.name: King oyster
items.description: Large, trumpet-shaped white mushroom with a thick stem
items.taste: Firm and slightly sweet, excellent grilled

consumption_effect.description: A hearty, filling mushroom favored by travelers

items.name: Moonchook
items.description: Luminescent pale blue mushrooms that glow faintly in darkness
items.smell: Cool and ethereal, like moonlit mist
items.taste: Light and refreshing with a minty finish

consumption_effect.description: Prized for their magical glow; alchemists pay well

items.name: Pook morel
items.description: Small, spongy morels with a distinctive pook-face pattern

consumption_effect.description: Named for their resemblance to pook faces; harmless

items.name: Redslob
items.description: Crimson, gelatinous mass that quivers when touched

consumption_effect.description: Mildly restorative; heals 1 HP if eaten fresh

items.name: Sage toe
items.description: Gnarled, toe-shaped mushroom with a wrinkled grey cap
items.smell: Herbal and medicinal, like dried sage

consumption_effect.description: Grants +1 to saves vs poison for 4 hours

items.name: Shrieker spawn
items.description: Tiny purple mushrooms that emit a faint squeak when picked

consumption_effect.description: Causes mild nausea if more than 3 are consumed

items.name: Stinkhorn
items.description: Phallic mushroom covered in dark green slime
items.taste: Once cleaned, surprisingly mild and pleasant

consumption_effect.description: The smell is far worse than the taste

items.name: Treasure chanterelle
items.description: Golden, vase-shaped mushroom with forked ridges

consumption_effect.description: Highly sought after by fine dining establishments

items.name: Velvet shank
items.description: Orange-brown caps with dark, velvety stems
items.taste: Tender with a slightly gelatinous texture

consumption_effect.description: Can survive frost, found even in winter

items.name: Witch's butter
items.description: Bright yellow-orange gelatinous blobs on dead wood

consumption_effect.description: Said to appear where witches have passed

items.name: Wood ear
items.description: Brown, ear-shaped jelly fungus on elder branches
items.taste: Crunchy and absorbent, takes on other flavors well

consumption_effect.description: Popular in soups and stews throughout Dolmenwood

items.name: Barb cone
items.description: Spiky pine cone with edible seeds hidden within

consumption_effect.description: Requires patience to extract the seeds

items.name: Bent leek
items.description: Wild leek with a characteristic curved stem
items.taste: Sharp and savory, excellent in cooking

consumption_effect.description: A staple wild vegetable in Dolmenwood cuisine

items.name: Bitter chestnut
items.description: Small, dark chestnuts in spiny husks

consumption_effect.description: Must be roasted to remove bitterness

items.name: Crake berries
items.description: Clusters of small black berries on thorny bushes
items.taste: Tart and juicy with many seeds

consumption_effect.description: Mildly intoxicating if eaten in large quantities

items.name: Cuckoo sorrel
items.description: Clover-like leaves with a distinctive arrow shape

consumption_effect.description: Popular as a thirst-quenching trail snack

items.name: Drude root
items.description: Gnarled root with bark-like skin

consumption_effect.description: Provides sustained energy; no fatigue for 4 hours

items.name: Fairy thimble
items.description: Tiny purple bell-shaped flowers on tall stalks

consumption_effect.description: May cause fey visions after dark

items.name: Fen pepper
items.description: Small red pods growing in marshy areas
items.taste: Intensely hot, used sparingly as seasoning

consumption_effect.description: Causes intense warmth; resistance to cold for 2 hours

items.name: Gorger bean
items.description: Large, meaty beans in twisted pods

consumption_effect.description: Very filling; counts as 2 rations worth of food

items.name: Hob nut
items.description: Small hazelnuts with an iridescent sheen
items.smell: Sweet and nutty with a strange undertone
items.taste: Delicious but leaves an odd tingling sensation

consumption_effect.description: Grants -2 to saves vs magic for 8 hours

items.name: Jellycup
items.description: Translucent, cup-shaped flowers filled with sweet gel

consumption_effect.description: Causes vivid hallucinations after dark

items.name: Moon carrot
items.description: Pale white root vegetable that glows faintly
items.taste: Crisp and sweet, sweeter than normal carrots

consumption_effect.description: Grants improved night vision for 4 hours

items.name: Nettlecress
items.description: Stinging nettles with edible cress-like leaves

consumption_effect.description: Must be cooked to remove stinging properties

items.name: Pigwort
items.description: Broad, fleshy leaves often found near pig trails

consumption_effect.description: Named because pigs love to root for it

items.name: Ramp
items.description: Broad-leaved wild onion with a red-tinged stem
items.taste: Pungent and flavorful, prized in cooking

consumption_effect.description: A spring delicacy throughout the Wood

items.name: Sloe berry
items.description: Small, dark blue berries with a dusty bloom

consumption_effect.description: Used to make sloe gin; taverns will buy them

items.name: Sweetmoss
items.description: Soft, verdant moss with a sugary coating
items.taste: Sweet and refreshing, melts on the tongue

consumption_effect.description: A favorite treat of woodland sprites

items.name: Wanderer's friend
items.description: Hardy green herb that grows along forest paths

consumption_effect.description: Heals 1 HP when chewed fresh

items.name: Wild garlic
items.description: Broad leaves and white star-shaped flowers
items.smell: Powerful garlic scent that fills the air
items.taste: Mild garlic flavor, less pungent than cultivated

consumption_effect.description: Common but always welcome for cooking

items.name: Wood apple
items.description: Small, gnarled crabapple with mottled skin
items.taste: Sour and astringent, better when cooked

consumption_effect.description: Mildly sedative; may cause drowsiness

_metadata.extraction_note: Common forageable items from foraging tables, effects apply on consumption
